decision_conditions: By reason of its height, depth and siting along the boundaries of neighbouring property no 41 Moor Lane, it is considered  the proposed development  would unduly impact on the amenities of  the adjoining occupiers by reason of overbearing impact, an undue sense of enclosure and result in a significant  loss of daylight, as such the proposed development is contrary to Policies D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8, DM10 of RBK Core Strategy 2012 and Residential Design SPD (2013).

The proposed development by reason of its scale, siting  and design would fail to appear to be subordinate  or proportionate to the host dwelling  resulting in an unacceptable harm to the character and appearance of the host dwelling and the surrounding area. The proposal is therefore contrary to Policy D3 of the London Plan and Policy CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012 and the Residential Design SPD (2013)
description: Demolition of single storey rear extension and erection of single storey rear extension and single storey front extension
